thread.title: New imagery from Pompeii reveals surprising discoveries PBS NewsHour
thread.title_full: Video: New imagery from Pompeii reveals surprising discoveries | Watch PBS NewsHour Online | PBS Video

author: pbs.org
title: New imagery from Pompeii reveals surprising discoveries PBS NewsHour
text: Researchers in Italy are now using modern medical technology to shed more light on the ancient mystery of the volcanic eruption that destroyed Pompeii. NewsHour's Megan Thompson reports.
